FuncDef: The reset qos queue statistics command clears queue-based traffic statistics. The reset qos queue statistics command clears queue-based traffic statistics.
CLIs: reset qos queue statistics { interface <interface-name> | interface <interface-type> <interface-number> | slot <slot-id> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: To collect queue-based statistics within a certain period, run the reset qos queue statistics command to clear the existing statistics first.
